articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Makeup may contain potentially toxic chemicals, study finds
articles.description: The "No PFAS in Cosmetics Act" will be introduced in the US House and Senate on Tuesday following the release of a new study that found high levels of a marker for toxic PFAS substances in 52% of 231 makeup products purchased in the United States and Canada.
articles.content:
By Sandee LaMotte, CNN
Updated 6:27 AM ET, Tue June 15, 2021
 (CNN)The "No PFAS in Cosmetics Act" will be introduced in the US House and Senate on Tuesday following the release of a new study that … [+11914 chars]

articles.author: Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: Millions in the West are still under heat warnings as parched conditions threaten even more wildfires
articles.description: More than 4 million people remain under heat warnings in parts of the Pacific Northwest as drought conditions could be exacerbated by record high temperatures through the holiday weekend.
articles.content:

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: President Biden wins global support for massive tax overhaul
articles.description: The United States has won international backing for its plan to overhaul the global system for taxing companies, a huge step toward simplifying a complex web of rules long exploited by big corporations.

articles.author: Laura Smith-Spark and Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Carrie Johnson steps onto global stage with G7 role
articles.description: Carrie Johnson, the new wife of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson, has taken her first step onto the global stage as she welcomed United States President Joe Biden and first lady Jill Biden to Cornwall, southwest England.

articles.title: There are at least 200 known cases of the Delta Plus coronavirus variant worldwide. Here's what we know
